thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 18 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-SL Green Realty Corp Reports Q1 EPS Of $1.12 Per Share

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SL Green Realty Corp Reports Q1 EPS Of $1.12 Per Share
text:
April 18 (Reuters) - SL Green Realty Corp:
* REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 EPS OF $1.12 PER SHARE; AND FFO OF $1.66 PER SHARE
* Q1 FFO PER SHARE $1.66 * SL GREEN REALTY - SAME-STORE CASH NOI, INCLUDING SHARE OF SAME-STORE CASH NOI FROM UNCONSOLIDATED JOINT VENTURES, INCREASED BY 7.4% FOR QUARTER ENDED MARCH 31, 2018
* FOR QUARTER, CONSOLIDATED PROPERTY SAME-STORE CASH NOI INCREASED BY 4.6% TO $128.1 MILLION AS COMPARED TO SAME PERIOD IN 2017
* QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $301.7 MILLION VERSUS $377.4 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.46, REVENUE VIEW $260.6 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
